answer: Coveo's ML relevance ranking combines user behavior signals with content features to continuously optimize search resultsã€1ã€‘. The platform's Automatic Relevance Tuning (ART) leverages click-through data to refine rankings over time, ensuring high-intent content surfaces firstã€2ã€‘.
